Description:
Upsize in space and style.
Taking up a prominent position on the corner of Emily Court, this four-bedroom, rendered-brick home offers space and size for the growing family to spread their wings, as well as affording a convenient location within close walking distance to Croydon Central.
Occupying a large 853m2 (approx.) block, a sizable deck welcomes you into the home where neutral tones and polished floorboards create a feeling of warmth and homeliness. Two separate living areas include a comfortable lounge with French doors leading to the front deck and a family area which spills out to a large covered entertaining zone designed for all-year-round use.
This beautifully renovated home showcases a modern kitchen comprising stainless steel appliances; electric oven, gas stove and dishwasher, stone benchtops, pendant lighting, wine rack and veggie spray. Ample cupboard and bench space are an essential component while air-conditioning in the adjoining meals area is also an added bonus.
The interconnection between indoors and outdoors is a key design element of the home, and the master is no exception with access to its own private deck. The master also features a walk-in robe, double built-in robe, Roman blinds and contemporary full ensuite boasting a rain shower, Caesarstone wall-hung vanity, square-profile tapware and large format floor-to-wall tiles. The main bathroom echoes the same commitment to quality and design, servicing three additional bedrooms (two robed).
It's the many details that sets this home apart from the norm, with features listing as; highly functional laundry fitted with generous storage and bench space plus gas ducted heating. The home also comprises two separate driveways including; one with a single carport and the other offering drive-in/drive-out ease from Emily Courtperfect for the tradesperson with more than one vehicle. Furthermore, the spacious rear yard is ideal for children and pets.
This property is positioned only a brief walk from Silcock Reserve with barbeque area and playground, Croydon Railway Station, bus stop, Croydon Primary School, The Good Shepherd Primary School, Melba College, Luther College, as well as offering momentary access to Croydon Hills Primary School, Yarra Valley Grammar, EastLink freeway, Croydon Memorial Pool and tennis courts.
If you're in search of a residence to settle down and begin a family or desire to upsize without compromise, you've found your perfect home.
